title: Enterococcus faecium, Staphylococcus aureus, Klebsiella pneumoniae, Acinetobacter baumannii, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, and Enterobacter (ESKAPE) Pathogens and Colistin Resistance in Ventilator-Associated Pneumonia: A Prospective Cross-Sectional Study.
abstract: Ventilator-associated pneumonia (VAP) comes under hospital-acquired infections (HAI), which is an ongoing threat to both patients and healthcare workers. In our hospital,
